meanings.definition: A person or animal that urinates.
meanings.sent1: The urinators at the zoo always make sure the animals have clean enclosures.
meanings.sent2: The urinators in the house trained their pets to go outside.
meanings.sent3: The urinators in the park were careful not to step on any puddles.
meanings.sent4: The urinators in the forest marked their territory like wild animals.
meanings.sent5: The urinators in the school restroom were reminded to flush after using the toilet.

meanings.sent1: The group of urinators gathered to discuss water conservation.
meanings.sent2: The urinators in the competition were all given water bottles.
meanings.sent3: The urinators in the movie theater had to wait in a long line during intermission.
meanings.sent4: The urinators in the stadium formed a long queue at the restrooms.
meanings.sent5: The urinators in the park were excited to find a clean public restroom nearby.
